document.full_text: willie harris and ike davis homered, the knuckleballer r.a. dickey picked up where he left off last year and the mets beat the florida marlins on sunday to win their season-opening series.
document.title: mets, 9, marlins 2: harris, davis lead mets past marlins
lines_and_colors: willie harris and ike davis homered, the knuckleballer r.a. dickey picked up where he left off last year and the mets beat the florida marlins on sunday to win their season-opening series.
